name: Kategna Ethiopian Restaurant
description: A cozy restaurant that serves traditional Ethiopian dishes and has outdoor seating.

name: Dire Dawa Delights
description: Discover the unique flavors of Dire Dawa with a diverse menu featuring local specialties.

name: Lucy Ethiopian Restaurant
description: An authentic Ethiopian restaurant offering a variety of traditional dishes.

name: Shaheen Restaurant
description: A spice-focused restaurant offering a wide range of aromatic Ethiopian dishes.

name: Dashen Traditional Restaurant
description: A traditional Ethiopian restaurant with cultural performances and communal dining.

name: Totot Traditional Restaurant
description: A traditional restaurant showcasing the rich flavors and cultural heritage of Ethiopia.

name: Yod Abyssinia Cultural Restaurant
description: A cultural restaurant that serves Ethiopian cuisine and has live music performances.

name: Taitu Ethiopian Restaurant
description: One of the oldest Ethiopian restaurants, serving authentic dishes in a historic setting.

name: Ras Ethiopian Restaurant
description: An Ethiopian restaurant known for its flavorful meat and vegetarian dishes.

name: Ethio Delight Restaurant
description: A delightful Ethiopian restaurant offering a range of traditional and modern dishes.

name: Taste of Lalibela
description: Experience the culinary delights of Lalibela with a blend of traditional and modern Ethiopian dishes.

name: Harar Coffee House
description: Sip on the famous Harari coffee while enjoying the cozy ambiance of this traditional coffee house.

name: Addis Ababa Bistro
description: A trendy bistro in the heart of Addis Ababa, serving a fusion of Ethiopian and international cuisines.

name: Hawassa Fish Market
description: Indulge in fresh seafood dishes sourced from Lake Hawassa at this bustling fish market restaurant.

name: 2000 Habesha Cultural Restaurant
description: A cultural restaurant that serves Ethiopian and Eritrean cuisine and has traditional seating.

name: Axumite Cuisine
description: Immerse yourself in the culinary traditions of Axum with a menu inspired by ancient Ethiopian recipes.

name: Gonder Grill
description: Grill your own meat to perfection in the historical city of Gonder at this lively grill restaurant.

name: Awash Riverside Restaurant
description: Relish delicious Ethiopian cuisine while enjoying the serene views of the Awash River.

name: Semien Mountain Lodge restaurant
description: Dine amidst the stunning landscapes of the Simien Mountains at this mountain lodge restaurant.

name: Bahir Dar Brasserie
description: Enjoy a fusion of Ethiopian and French cuisines at this elegant brasserie in Bahir Dar.
